name: Dot Garden
description:
A relaxing walk in a pretty pointillism style garden. Find the hidden letters scattered around the garden, and enjoy their message. GGJ Submission

You can enable simple text format for easier reading in the start up settings.

How to: 
WASD for movement
Hold Left-Shift to Run
Use Mouse to look around
Left-Click to interact with objects
ESC to exit game

Team:
Mauno Kiiskinen
Riikka Kilpeläinen
Firri April
Miro Vesterinen

Other credits:
